definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: May the joy of the Sping Festival be with you throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 願新春佳節的喜悅，伴隨您度過新的一年。

sentences.english: Lantern Festival is generally considered the last day of the Chinese Lunar New Year.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節一般被認爲是中國新春佳節的最後一天。

sentences.english: The Spring Festival, north Korea's women wear new.
sentences.chinese: 新春佳節，朝鮮的婦女穿戴一新。

sentences.english: On the occasion of the Spring Festival, good business.
sentences.chinese: 值此新春佳節之際，恭祝事業蒸蒸日上。

sentences.english: According to Chinese tradition, the Lantern Festival is the last day of the Chinese New Year celebration.
sentences.chinese: 從中國民俗來說，元宵節是中國新春佳節的收尾。

sentences.english: my arms are wide open for you this new year.
sentences.chinese: 張開雙臂，盼與你共度新春佳節。
